    • Uses of InputHandler in org.ardenus.input.handler

      Subclasses of InputHandler in org.ardenus.input.handler 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameCubeHandler
      An input handler that can be used to listen for input from GameCube controllers using the Wii U Smash Bros.
      class  KeyboardHandler
      An input handler that can be used to listen for keyboard and mouse inputs.
      class  WirelessInputHandler
      An input handler that can be used to listen for wireless controller inputs using the GLFW controller API.
